total_supported_devices.description: Total number of devices that support Full Encryption.

with_decrypting_drives.description: Number of devices with at least one disk currently in the decryption process.

with_encrypted_by_user_drives.description: Number of devices where a user encrypted some or all of the disks.

with_encrypted_drives.description: Number of devices with Full Encryption on all disks.

with_encrypted_partially_by_user_drives.description: Number of devices where a user encrypted some or all of the disks. Full Encryption encrypts or decrypts the remainder.

with_encrypted_partially_drives.description: Number of devices with at least one disk with Full Encryption complete.

with_encrypting_drives.description: Number of devices with at least one disk currently in the encryption process.

with_non_encrypted_drives.description: Number of devices with no disks encrypted by the user or Full Encryption.

with_unknown_encryption_status.description: Number of devices with disks encrypted with an authentication method that Full Encryption does not support.
